    #include<stdio.h>
int  main()
{
    int i,j,a,k,p;
   int m,n,sum;
        
  while(scanf("%d",&m)!=EOF)
{sum=0;    a=1;
        j=1;k=0;sum=0;
            while(a>=1)
            {
                a=m/(5*j);
                 sum+=a;
                j=j*5;
               k++;
 }
            printf("%d\n",sum);
 }
    return 0;
}
